attributes.action: Nationalise and De-Privatise the Public Transport Network
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please make Public transport run for the Public, instead of allowing it to be run by companies only interested in the profit margin. Many benefits can be realised of a nationalised government run public transport system, not limited to reduction in congestion, reduced pollution and improved economy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
